Articles.Content: Is there some way to get a callback whenever the activeVessel (or otherwise) enters a new situation and/or biome? I've been looking at GameEvents, but am otherwise pretty clueless about this topic.

There's not one currently to my knowledge, but you could write one reasonably simply with a repeating function and in that seeing if the Biome name has changed, and then raising an event. The code to get the name can be seen here - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/7544-The-official-unoffical-help-a-fellow-plugin-developer-thread?p=941535&viewfull=1#post941535
